## ShortcutRegistry.KeyboardShortcut.keyCodes property

Optional list of key codes to be bound (via ShortcutRegistry.prototype.addKeyMapping) to this shortcut.

**Signature:**

```typescript
keyCodes?: (number | string)[];
```
